title: error: ImportError: /anaconda3/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/lib/libTHC.so.1: cannot read file data
body_html:
Hi
I have upgarde my pytorch version to 0.1.11 with: conda update pytorch torchvision -c soumith. and with this command conda list | grep pytorch verified the new version upgarding. But when I want to import torch package, I receive this error:

Traceback (most recent call last):
File "YOLO_demo_v3_offline.py", line 1, in
import torch
File "/home/mohammad/anaconda3/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/init.py", line 53, in
from torch._C import *
ImportError: /home/mohammad/anaconda3/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/lib/libTHC.so.1: cannot read file data

So What should if do then?

body:
Hi
I have upgarde my pytorch version to 0.1.11 with: `conda update pytorch torchvision -c soumith`. and with this command `conda list | grep pytorch` verified the new version upgarding. But when I want to import torch package, I receive this error:

> Traceback (most recent call last):
>   File "YOLO_demo_v3_offline.py", line 1, in <module>
>     import torch
>   File "/home/mohammad/anaconda3/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/__init__.py", line 53, in <module>
>     from torch._C import *
> ImportError: /home/mohammad/anaconda3/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/lib/libTHC.so.1: cannot read file data


So What should if do then?
